channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-25691|2024-08-03T04:42:50.663Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Denial of service in Modem due to reachable assertion while processing SIB1 with invalid SCS and bandwidth settings in Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-25723|2024-08-03T04:49:42.926Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Memory corruption in multimedia due to use after free during callback registration failure in Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-25672|2024-08-03T04:42:50.598Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Denial of service in MODEM due to reachable assertion while processing SIB1 with invalid Bandwidth in Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-25671|2024-08-03T04:42:50.684Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Denial of service in MODEM due to reachable assertion in Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-25750|2024-08-03T04:49:43.167Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Memory corruption in BTHOST due to double free while music playback and calls over bluetooth headset in Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-33217|2024-08-03T08:01:20.364Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Memory corruption in Qualcomm IPC due to buffer copy without checking the size of input while starting communication with a compromised kernel. in Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-25689|2024-08-03T04:42:50.658Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Denial of service in Modem due to reachable assertion in Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-22077|2024-08-03T03:00:55.198Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Memory corruption in graphics due to use-after-free in graphics dispatcher logic in Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-25673|2024-08-03T04:42:50.635Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Denial of service in MODEM due to reachable assertion while processing configuration from network in Snapdragon Mobile
